programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Adam helps Jessica throw a farewell party for Luxe, hoping that she will revamp Luxe and rid it of its criminal links. Louis realises that he wants to rekindle things with Rosnani, leaving Zara heartbroken.

programme.title: Talking Point Special
programme.desc: (Encore) What does a COVID-19 endemic reality mean, and what will it take for Singapore to get there? Talking Point travels to Germany to find out what living with COVID is like.

programme.title: Radio 1's Big Weekend 2019
programme.desc: The Big Weekend is back for it's 16th year with another stellar line up. This Highlights special includes all of the greatest performances from across both incredible days. Headlined by the 1975 and Miley Cyrus, these specially curated highlights feature all of the greatest performances from across both incredible days. Also featuring Billie Eilish, Mumford & Sons, Lewis Capaldi, Little Mix and many more!

programme.title: The Australian Ballet: Cinderella
programme.desc: Made especially for The Australian Ballet by Alexei Ratmansky, the worlds most in-demand choreographer, Cinderella has all the elements of the story we know and love - a feisty heroine, a dashing prince, a kindly godmother and a deliciously wicked stepmother with some fantastical additions.

programme.title: Help! Get Me Out Of Yesterday!
programme.desc: A bright, colourful comedy where an obnoxious and spoilt 14 yr old's life is turned upside down, when he finds himself waking up to the same horrible day over and over!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Special: Digs & Discoveries: All Tracks Lead to Rome (Italy)
programme.desc: While working in Italy, Thomas makes exciting discoveries, while Jack and the Pack help with building a new museum.

programme.title: Counting With Paula S5
programme.desc: Paula makes a new hat for Prince Aamil. But changing the prince's outfit leads to some undesirable outcomes in the Desert. It's Jungle Boy's birthday! The children and their jungle friends plan a surprise party, but they have trouble keeping it a secret from Jungle Boy. Will the surprise birthday party be a success?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Special: Digs & Discoveries: Mines of Mystery (Italy)
programme.desc: While working in Italy, Thomas makes exciting discoveries, while Jack and the Pack help with building a new museum.

programme.title: Paw Patrol Ready Race Rescue!
programme.desc: When legendary racer the Whoosh can't compete at the Adventure Bay 500, Marshall and the heroic pups shift into high gear for a new mission.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S7
programme.desc: Cherry has entered herself for the Ollipolis Voice Talent Search. She grows envious of Triangle Man when everyone seems to like his yodelling better than her singing, but a surprise voice swap teaches her to appreciate what she has. The Inter-Town Basketball Play-Offs is underway and the Imp wants in. He wants to win the grand prize - a pair of limited-edition trainers! Signing up with his robots, he soon realises that the fun of it is in playing in a team.

programme.title: True And The Rainbow Kingdom Specials
programme.desc: It's time to collect Plumpkin Day treats, but when tricky treats' start turning everyone into a Howling Greenie, True and her friends need to figure out how to save the town.

programme.title: My Little Pony Equestria Girls Special: Sunset's Backstage Pass
programme.desc: Sunset Shimmer and Pinkie Pie are excited to see their favourite band perform at the Starswirled Music Festival, but Equestrian magic causes Sunset to get stuck re-living the first day of the festival over and over.

programme.title: Overboard
programme.desc: After a spoiled, wealthy yacht owner is thrown overboard and loses his memory, a mistreated employee convinces him that he is her working-class husband.

programme.title: Mika: Sinfonia Pop - Live in Italy
programme.desc: In October 2015, BRIT Award winner and pop singer-songwriter sensation Mika lit up the stage of Italy's Teatro Sociale di Como. Joined by an especially assembled orchestra for the occasion, and conducted by Simon Leclerc of the Montreal Symphony Orchestra, the Grace Kelly hit-maker delivered an exceptional concert performance of both new tracks and classic hits from his career. Includes Elle Me Dit, Happy Ending and the Grammy nominated Love Today.

programme.title: OddBods Special: Party Monsters
programme.desc: Dressed up as detective Sherlock Holmes, Slick must crack the case when a magician turns Jeff's spooky-costume party guests into their scary alter egos.

programme.title: OddBods Special: OddBeard's Curse
programme.desc: Fuse fishes a treasure chest out of the sea - and unexpectedly awakens the ghost of Pirate OddBeard!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Moon Monster Madness
programme.desc: The Scooby gang investigate a possible alien presence while exploring a moon base built by an eccentric billionaire celebrity.

programme.title: America's Got Talent S16
programme.desc: America's Got Talent returnswith fresh new faces and familiar favorites, along with the excitement, thrills and feel-good performances that viewers have come to love each season. Amateur performers present their singing, dancing, comedy and novelty acts to celebrity judges and a nationwide audience in order to advance in the competition and win a huge prize.

programme.title: Dora And The Lost City Of Gold
programme.desc: Dora, a teenage explorer, leads her friends on an adventure to save her parents and solve the mystery behind a lost city of gold.

programme.title: News Tonight

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: Ever felt the dreaded post-lunch slump? A full stomach can make us too sleepy to resume work. How is our lunch affecting our productivity? And what should we eat so that we stay alert?

programme.desc: In England in 1987, a teenager from an Asian family learns to live his life, understand his family and find his own voice through the music of American rock star Bruce Springsteen.

programme.desc: A heartbroken man attends a spiritual retreat to cleanse himself and fix his broken life. There he meets a fellow lost soul, and together they discover that "the cleanse" releases more than everyday toxins...a lot more.

programme.title: The Australian Ballet: Coppelia
programme.desc: Coppelia has everything a good story ballet should: a touch of enchantment, a dash of romance and masses of sumptuous costumes. Swanilda and Franz are in love until the appearance of Dr Coppelius and his mysterious daughter Coppelia upset the celebrations. However, Dr Coppelius haughty daughter is not what she seems, and Swanilda must rescue Franz from the magicians sinister doll-filled lair. With the help of some fancy footwork, Swanilda manages to wake Franz and they escape from the house.

programme.desc: A mysterious thief is stealing Regal Academy students' precious belongings. Sheriff Little Red Riding Hood and her police-dogs are there to investigate. Thanks to Rose's insight, they will find out the thief is a Leprechaun who lives at the End of the Rainbow. The heroes will summon a rainbow and leave for the mission, unaware of the trap set by the Snow Queen.

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series

Host Charmian Tan comes to the rescue to make Alden's dream a reality. Will this aspiring genius be able to finish the job within 48 hours and a budget of $S1.500?

programme.title: Food Notes
programme.desc: In Japan, there is one food that is ubiquitous as hamburger in the United States, fish and chips in the United Kingdom, and kimchi in Korea. It is not sushi or tempura - it's curry! programme.title: Lion Mums S3
programme.desc: Something is gnawing at Durrani's conscience as she oscillates between feelings of guilt and defensiveness - but Reza, who is himself a bag of emotions - is certain it is not good as we wonder if this power couple will ever recover. In this period, the gradual grooming of Nabilah escalates with her new phone, which begins to cause a slight discomfort. programme.title: 小娘惹

programme.desc: 甜味、酸味、辣味，都是我们喜欢的味道，而苦味、涩味、呛腥味，却是大家难以接受的。有的食物天生就带有呛腥味，而某些食物的呛腥味，则来自于发酵过程中微生物对蛋白质的酵解。但是呛腥味的美食究竟搭配什么风味才是绝配呢？厨师兼主持人，杨应晖，将深入了解这个独特的风味，并尝试利用这个风味创造一道别具一格的菜肴。.

programme.title: 食在有价值
programme.desc: (重) 主持人到东南亚各地查看国际大事如环境污染及定价丑闻对食物价格的影响，让聪明的消费者对盘中物的价格有更深的了解。.

programme.title: 暖心厨房
programme.desc: (重) 新加坡佛教福利协会破天荒一次让摄制队进入社区厨房拍摄！厨房只有7个工作人员，却可以一周六日为贫病老人送上100份美味的斋食便当，秘诀在哪里？有幸进入低调厨房学习的谢韵仪，如何与时间赛跑，煮出美味斋菜？.

programme.title: 爱到最后
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 正韩告诉艾蜜莉崔德培还活着，要她拿着行车记录器画面的副本到警局报案，指崔德培在几年前在世娜的怂恿下开车撞她，让警方重新调查那起案件。艾蜜莉不肯照正韩的话做，因为一旦报了仇，她和正韩的契约婚姻就会划下句号。.

programme.title: 楼下女友请签收
programme.desc: (重)《楼下女友请签收》剧情讲述了为了赚钱维持家乡黄梅剧团的龙套演员温小暖被雇用扮演安宁文化CEO叶非墨的暗恋者之后，二人“假戏真做”成为真实爱侣的故事。.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 警方通知珊荷，她丈夫的尸体已经被寻获，珊荷当场昏倒。吴家替珊荷的丈夫办丧事，珊荷失魂落魄，无法接受事实。.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 珊荷怀疑艾丝特制造假尸体，试图掩饰真相。南俊知道珊荷已经发现尸体是假的，气艾丝特自作聪明惹祸。.

programme.title: 地球的庆典
programme.desc: (PG) 葡萄牙在大航海时代透过贸易，成为欧洲的经济强权，大量的财富涌入，作为开启海权时代快速开展，许多的菁英与富商都居住在这区，嗯～我有感觉到空气里有一种冒险的气息不对那应该是沙丁鱼的味道！因为接下来，我要带你们去体验夏天的里斯本最热闹的圣安东尼城市节，到底多HIGH？一起跟着庆典去旅行吧！.

programme.title: 爱的救援
programme.desc: (PG)(首播)(双声道-中/韩) 胜守前往DREAMS职业棒球队比赛的场地观看，想通过球赛暗中观察球员的表现，不料却看到了DREAMS球队内讧的画面。营运组长世英也看到大屏幕的画面，急忙跑去运动员席阻止他们在球赛中起冲突打架。。。。。。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 进击的台湾 S4
programme.desc: (重) 介绍台湾当地的美食与它们成功背后的故事。.

programme.title: 十大新加坡
programme.desc: (重) 新加坡人花钱不手软，几千元买一件衣服，上万元买一个旅游配套的，大有人在！究竟新加坡人最舍得把钱花在什么地方？衣？食？住？行？还是…这集节目就带你去看新加坡人有多会花钱！.

programme.title: 爱到最后
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 佳英想拿到度英的手机里的视频，证明世娜早在六年前就已经认识白哲了。刚好泰洙问佳英要如何平息贤基的绯闻，佳英于是提议让自己先搬进姜家打造她和贤基恩爱的画面。同一时间也可以有机会找度英的手机。一举多得。.

programme.title: 楼下女友请签收
programme.desc: (PG)(重)《楼下女友请签收》剧情讲述了为了赚钱维持家乡黄梅剧团的龙套演员温小暖被雇用扮演安宁文化CEO叶非墨的暗恋者之后，二人“假戏真做”成为真实爱侣的故事。.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子

programme.title: 左撇子妻子
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 秀浩偷偷拿了朴会长的血液做亲子鉴定。鉴定结果，两人确实是祖孙。秀浩将结果告诉珊荷，珊荷却怀疑艾丝特伪造了鉴定报告。.

programme.title: 爱的救援
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面)(双声道-中/韩) 当林东奎知道胜守计划要将他当成交换球员交易给另一支球队时，十分生气地向向胜守宣战。他不止毁了胜守的汽车，还派人殴打他。他要让胜守看到自己在DREAMS球队拥有什么样的影响力。.

programme.title: 爱到最后

programme.title: 楼下女友请签收

programme.title: 左撇子妻子
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 琴熙告诉南俊，秀浩和朴会长曾做过亲子鉴定，结果竟是吻合的。南俊怀疑秀浩就是朴家长孙。.

programme.title: Go Go 台湾 II

programme.title: 爱的救援
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 胜守在训练的场地外遇到了VIKINGS队团长金钟武。金钟武向他提出用VIKINGS队的投手金宽植与DREAMS队的林东奎进行交换。东奎买通记者，指使他写负面新闻攻击胜守。.

programme.title: Kek Untuk Kapten
programme.desc: Mia Sofia is livid when a baker refuses to sell her a cake. She doesn't realise that her father's insistence on having the cake is to welcome Adib and his family. Adib is happy to be meeting Sofia again after years of studying overseas. Sofia doesn't expect to meet the baker again while she is on duty.

programme.title: Kek Untuk Kapten
programme.desc: Indra tries to make up to Sofia for the accident so that his work will not be jeopardy. Hariz loses drive to continue his MMA sessions after finding out about his girlfriend but Illya is not about to let him give up. Adib excitedly shares his future plans with Sofia.
